achievement.description: Collect 15 shirt slot appearances.

achievement.description: Unlock each of the achievements listed below.

achievement.description: Collect 200 back slot appearances.

achievement.description: Collect 100 wrist slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Waist
achievement.description: Collect 100 waist slot appearances.

achievement.description: Collect 100 feet slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Hand
achievement.description: Collect 100 hand slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Legs
achievement.description: Collect 100 leg slot appearances.

achievement.description: Collect 100 shoulder slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Chest
achievement.description: Collect 100 chest slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Head
achievement.description: Collect 100 head slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Tabard
achievement.description: Collect 15 tabard slot appearances.

achievement.title: Fashionista: Weapon & Off hand
achievement.description: Collect 100 weapon and or Off hand slot appearances.

achievement.title: Collector's Edition: Baby Winston
achievement.description: Owner of the Overwatch Origins Edition and Collector's Edition pet, Baby Winston.

achievement.title: The Ashen Verdict
achievement.description: Earn Exalted status with the Ashen Verdict.

achievement.title: Deepwind Gorge Perfection
achievement.description: Win Deepwind Gorge with a score of 1500 to 0.

achievement.title: Thy Kingdom Come
achievement.description: Win Kor'lok's favor for your faction by defeating his bodyguard, Gaul Dun Firok.

achievement.title: We Had It All Along *cough*
achievement.description: Win Arathi Basin by 50 points or less.

criteria.description: Win Arathi Basin by 50 points or less.

achievement.title: Crazy for Cats
achievement.description: Obtain 20 of the cats listed below.
achievement.reward: Title Reward: The Crazy Cat Lady/Man

achievement.title: Family Reunion
achievement.description: Capture a battle pet from each family.

achievement.title: Take 'Em All On!
achievement.description: Win a solo pet battle against a pet of every family.

achievement.title: Crazy for Cats
achievement.description: Obtain 20 of the cats listed below.
achievement.reward: Title Reward: The Crazy Cat Lady/Man

achievement.title: Eastern Kingdoms Tamer
achievement.description: Capture a battle pet in each of the Eastern Kingdoms zones listed below.

achievement.title: Menagerie
achievement.description: Collect 125 unique pets.

achievement.title: Heroic: Zul'Gurub
achievement.description: Defeat Jin'do the Godbreaker in Zul'Gurub on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Ohganot So Fast!
achievement.description: Defeat Bloodlord Mandokir in Zul'Gurub on Heroic Difficulty without killing Ohgan.

achievement.title: It's Not Easy Being Green
achievement.description: Do not get hit by Bloodvenom, Pool of Acrid Tears, or Venomous Effusion in the High Priest Venoxis encounter in Zul'Gurub on Heroic Difficulty.

achievement.title: Grand Theft, 1st Degree
achievement.description: Loot 100 Artifact Fragments from enemy players.

achievement.title: Ashran Victory
achievement.description: Kill the opposing faction Commander while controlling all points on the Road of Glory.

achievement.title: Raiding with Leashes
achievement.description: Collect all of the battle pets listed below from classic raids.

achievement.title: Alone in the Darkness (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Yogg-Saron without the assistance of any Keepers in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: They're Coming Out of the Walls (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat 9 Guardians of Yogg-Saron within 12 seconds in 10-player mode.

criteria.description: Kill 9 Guardians of Yogg-Saron in 12 seconds.

achievement.title: Shadowdodger (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat General Vezax without any raid member being hit by Shadow Crash in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: Getting Back to Nature (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Freya while she is affected by 25 stacks of Attuned to Nature in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: Don't Stand in the Lightning (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Thorim without any raid member being struck by Lightning Charge in 10-player mode.

criteria.description: Thorim: Do not by struck by Lightning Charge.

achievement.title: Getting Cold in Here (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Hodir without any raid member having more than 2 stacks of Biting Cold in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: With Open Arms (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Kologarn without destroying either of his arms in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: If Looks Could Kill (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Kologarn without any raid member being hit by Focused Eyebeams in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: I Choose You, Runemaster Molgeim (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Runemaster Molgeim as the last member alive in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: Unbroken (10 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Flame Leviathan on the first try without anyone repairing their vehicle in 10-player mode.

achievement.title: Not One, But Two Jormungars (25 player)
achievement.description: Defeat Acidmaw and Dreadscale within 10 seconds of each other in 25-player mode.

achievement.title: He's Mine!
achievement.description: Capture 10 pets in pet battle.

achievement.title: Northrend Tamer
achievement.description: Capture a battle pet in each of the Northrend zones listed below.

achievement.title: Local Pet Mauler
achievement.description: Win a pet battle in 10 different zones.
